item.title: Janna add a quote by Alfred, Lord Tennyson
item.description: "There lives more faith in honest doubt, believe me, than in half the creeds." -- Alfred, Lord Tennyson

item.title: Janna add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "You didn't kill him. He would have killed you, but you didn't kill him." "So? He was stupid. If I killed everyone who was stupid, I wouldn't have time to sleep." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Janna add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "I distrust any advice that contains the words 'ought' or 'should'." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Janna add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I've been making a list of the things they don't teach you at school. They don't teach you how to love somebody. They don't teach you how to be famous. They don't teach you how to be rich or how to be poor. They don't teach you how to walk away from someone you don't love any longer. They don't teach you how to know what's going on in someone else's mind. They don't teach you what to say to someone who's dying. They don't teach you anything worth knowing." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Janna add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Sometimes you wake up. Sometimes the fall kills you. And sometimes, when you fall, you fly." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Janna add a quote by Walter M. Miller Jr.
item.description: "You don’t <i>have</i> a soul, Doctor. You <i>are</i> a soul. You <i>have</i> a body, temporarily." -- Walter M. Miller Jr.

item.title: Janna add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "We read to know we're not alone." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Janna add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "A children's story that can only be enjoyed by children is not a good children's story in the slightest." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Janna add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places; but still there is much that is fair, and though in all lands love is now mingled with grief, it grows perhaps the greater." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Janna add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Don’t wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Janna add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein
